nodes.text: Russo-ISC was a SP-4 ISC crime scene analysis droid who served the Jedi Order, working at the Jedi Temple during the Clone Wars. As a crime scene analyzer, he was assigned by Jedi Master Mace Windu to assist the Jedi in investigating the bombing of the Jedi Temple hangar.

Constructed on the galactic capital of Coruscant, Russo-ISC was a crime scene analysis droid who served the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars. After the bombing of the Jedi Temple hangar, he worked with Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and his apprentice Ahsoka Tano to discover who the perpetrator was.
